name: RANGON
description:
Let's get rid of the yellow friend's hump. When cells come together in the only same shape, they become hump. Make movement so that different shape of cells meet. Help your friend keep healthy.

노란 친구의 혹을 없애줍시다. 같은 모양들끼리만 뭉친 세포들은 시간이 지나면 혹이 됩니다. 서로 다른 모양의 세포들이 만날 수 있게 움직임을 만들어서 친구의 몸 속을 건강하게 유지해주세요.

🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽

Control: W, A, S, D or arrow keys

🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽

This game was created within 48 hours with team RANGON. This game was made for Gr8ArtGames Gamejam with "Art, Politics, Digital Games and 'UTOPIA'" theme.

🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽 🐽

team RANGON

RANG: Game Design, Graphic

GON: Programming
